Reworkd (https://reworkd.ai/) - San Francisco (In-person) - Full-time - 2+ years of full-time experience

We're hiring a founding backend engineer to help us build infrastructure to run web agents at scale.

We're a super small scrappy team of four that's been working on the application layer of web agents since it's inception. Our projects have over 30k stars on GitHub, we're backed by PG himself + a bunch of great investors, and we have 3+ years of runway. Join us if you want to grind, want a lot of ownership, and are experienced. (More info about the role in our job posting)
